PricebookEntryAdjustment.name: PricebookEntryAdjustment
PricebookEntryAdjustment.description: Read-only junction object created when you associate a price adjustment schedule with a price book entry.

PriceAdjustmentScheduleId.description: The ID of the price book entry adjustment.

PricebookEntryId.description: The ID of the price book entry that this price book entry adjustment is associated with.
